ej,garvs001,P,willc901,Call at HP $Bip Roberts made late break for HP after rounding 3B; replay showed that he tagged the plate, but HP umpire Charlie Williams made no signal; catcher Ozzie Virgil ran over to tag Roberts, who was still on the ground; Steve Garvey, the on deck hitter, was ejected by Williams after Garvey drew a line at HP where Roberts had slid and touched HP; Garvey said something to Williams and was tossed
